DOC.brief_summary: Although morbidly obese subjects have larger than regular caloric intake, there is evidence that they suffer from nutritional deficiencies at a higher rate than the general population, probably because they eat mostly "unhealthy food."
DOC.brief_title: Nutritional Deficiencies in the Bariatric Patients
DOC.criteria: All morbidly obese subjects who are surgery candidates Previous bariatric operations
